name: YEИDRY
description: '''Yendry Cony Fiorentino ''' (born 27 July 1993) known mononymously as '''Yendry'''  (stylized as '''{{nowrap|YEИDRY}}''') is a Dominican-Italian singer and songwriter. Yendry first achieved popularity in Italy in 2012 thanks to her participation in the sixth edition of [[X Factor (Italian season 6)|X Factor Italy]] which earned her a record deal with [[Sony Music|Sony Music Italy]]. From 2015 to 2018 she was the [[frontman|frontwoman]] of the [[musical ensemble|group]] ''Materianera''. In 2020 after the release of the singles ''Barrio'' and ''Nena'' she achieved international popularity and she signed a double record deal contract with [[RCA Records]] and [[Sony Music Latin]]. On April 15, 2021, she was one of the performers for the [[Latin American Music Awards of 2021]]. On June 7, 2021, she was nominated as ''Best New Artist'' at the [[2021 MTV Millennial Awards]]. On January 25, 2022, she received the nomination as Best New Female artist for the 2022 [[Lo Nuestro Awards|Premio Lo Nuestro]].
